name: Holiday Apple Side Salad
author: sharon
summary: This is a cold salad/side dish recipe that has been served in my in-laws home for Thanksgiving and Christmas since the 1950's.
ingredients: 2 (16 ounce) cans dark red kidney beans, drained and rinsed
2 large Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and diced
1 bunch red globe grapes, halved and seeded
1 ½ cups creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip ™
directions: In a large bowl mix together the kidney beans, celery, and grapes
Stir in the creamy salad dressing a little at a time
Adjust the amount of creamy salad dressing to suit your taste
